entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

MOSTLY CLOUDY

PARTLY CLOUDY

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
